::DarkMouse::

Her optics glow blue as the machine erases her mind, but doesn't erase all 
of her memory.  Some of her past experiences will be stored, but they will 
have little effect on the new programming.


-------------Original Message-----------
>From: crow_lord@...

>Scroponok

>Scorponok smiles as he hears the orders. "Yes,sir." Scorponok strabs
>Darkmouse down to a table. He start the machine. "Now be quiet my
>dear
>Mouse, Your mind should be blank within a few moments." Scorponok
>turns towards a computer console. He starts to type a few keys wating
>for Darkmouse's mind to go blank.
